subject: Junit reporting
msgSnippet: Hi All, I am using JUnit for regression testing. One of my test case methods executes same testconditions with a list of input data. When one of my test case
messageBody:
Hi All,
I am using JUnit for regression testing. One of my test case methods executes same testconditions with a list of input data. When one of my test case condition fails, JUnit reports failure and aborts from further executing the other test data.

While it reports the failure, I would love it to execute the other tests also in the test method and report their results. Is there a way to make JUnit it to report alone and ignore the failures to continue testing.

Please find the sample code.

public void testMyStuff(){
String expectedResult[] = getExpectedResult();
String actualResult[] = getActualResult();
for(int i=0;i<expectedResult.length;i++){
assertEquals("Case failed"+i,expectedResult[i],actualResult[i] );
}
}


Any help is greatly appreciated.

Thanks,
Raj
